title: Why are the new Star Guardian Skins Unavailable? (2016)
body: The new skins are out, and I see them, but why are they unavailable? Do they release them then wait to make them available? I'm still new to stuff being released. I was really hyped. This is probably the stupidest question ever xD.

replies.body: News skins usually get released to the store after some time has gone by whenever a new path comes out.
That's what I thought, but does it depend on how long it will be put into the store? Thank you

New skins are often released **sometime during the patch**, not specifically the same day the patch comes out. I'm not sure of a specific measure of how long it actually takes for them to release after being teased. I'm pretty hyped for these skins too, so I'm ready to buy them ASAP as well! :D

Let's sit tight until they get their official release. Let me know if you have any questions.
